ygData.subject: RE: 7th Level Qeynos Blues
ygData.msgSnippet: Western Plains of Karana might be OK at level 7 (I m blanking on when I started hunting there, but I think it was 7 or 8). Stay close to the guard towers, and
ygData.messageBody:
Western Plains of Karana might be OK at level 7 (I'm blanking on when I
started hunting there, but I think it was 7 or 8). Stay close to the guard
towers, and look for Mist Wolves, Young Lionesses, Brown Bears and possibly
Young Lions.

The guards will attack everything you'll run into (unless you're unlucky
enough to find a wandering bandit) so you should be able to survive the
occasional grizzly attack as long as you run for cover straight away :)

- Steve (Tellos, 10th lvl, Veeshan)

> >
> > From: "Clarkson, Ron L" <clarkrl3@...>
> >
> > OK. I am a 7th level monk travelling through the Qeynos area on the new
> > Tribunal server. I've run into a stump, though. It seems to me that
> > everything in the area is now either conning green or conning yellow
>(few
> > and far between). However, if I go to different zones, it's instant red
> > cons. Any suggestions on getting over this level hump?
> >
